name: Legend of Mulan
overview: This is a Playstation game based on the story of Mulan (a legendary figure from ancient China who was originally described in a Chinese poem known as the Ballad of Mulan. In the poem, Hua Mulan takes her aged father's place in the army. She fought for 12 years and gained high merit, but she refused any reward and retired to her hometown instead.). The game includes: - Cartoon film - Jigsaw puzzles - Colouring game
